website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung ATIV Book 7 (NP740U3E-K01UB) ultrabook offers style and substance with solid performance, all-metal construction, and a 1080p touch screen.
cons: Reflective keys are hard to read

customer_reviews.title: a good macbook substitute
customer_reviews.text: For people who don't want to buy mac but like everything on the mac, this is a good substitute. The mac is a better laptop in my opinion. 4 things where the mac is better: mac runs cooler on the metal body where the np900 bottom felt warm/hot. The scroll pad cursor keep freezing up. The fan is loud. Window 8 and the boot petition takes up too much space and leaves only 48GB for use. The mac leaves 92GB after initial boot up. What I like about the np900: The price is right compared to the mac. Light weight. So far, battery life is about 5hrs.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Freezing up
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Series 9 looks great in design and it is very light. The looks and use are great however, it freezes very often when you are using Mozilla Firefox browser? I am wondering whether it is a browser problem or computer hardware issue. I had it for a couple weeks and for the price you would expect something better. I bought several Lenovo and never had any problems when using any browser. I hope it is not the hardware problem because it is not a cheap laptop, it is very light and the design is nice but if the hardware is a problem is does not matter how nice it looks because it is a useless computer...
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Slim, powerful and easy to use laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have this laptop for a month and it is absolutely the best value&quality combination you can get - as a student I needed it to be fast but easy to use and carry around. It met all this and more - fast starting (just couple of seconds), fast USB3 connection allows to enjoy speed data transfer. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Milda

customer_reviews.title: Light, fast, more disk space needed
customer_reviews.text: Good features: Very light weight, rapid start, good screen resolution. Not so good: Small size (128 GB) Solid-State Drive, which rapidly fills with programs, making the user constantly try to clean the disk to be able to continue. Sealing of screen is poor: a drop of water is enough to wreck the laptop, which forces you to mail the laptop to Samsung. Overall, I still prefer the Solid-State Drive to traditional hard drives. Hopefully Samsung will improve the sealing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LiveMind

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Series 9 NP900X3D-A04US 13.3-Inch Premium Ultrabook (Silver)

customer_reviews.title: Died within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I work in IT and havent had to buy a laptop in over 10 years. I really liked the size and specs of this laptop so I ordered it. Within 3 weeks the system board died. I contacted Samsung customer service and they are awful. they are clueless and I had to call back several times to get answers. The part was so back ordered that they said they would issue me a full refund. I heard from some colleagues that this has been happening a lot with Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop but returned
customer_reviews.text: The laptop lives up to most of the expectations presented in advertisement and reviews. Its super thin and light, has a super fast start up (flash memory) and it is beautifully designed. But there were a few small issues that made me return it. Namely the display was too small, I kind of had to squint to see things. And on the track pad i was finding it hard to right click, that may have been something I needed to work on. Most importantly, I realized that, although solidly built, 2.5 pounds is just too light for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Awan

product_meta.title: Samsung Series 9 NP900X3D-A04US 13.3-Inch Premium Ultrabook (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Designed with mobility in mind, Samsung's durable, ultra premium, lightweight Series 9 laptop (model NP900X3D-A04US) offers mobile professionals and power users a sophisticated laptop equally suited for work and entertainment. Featuring a minimalist look that is both simple and sophisticated, its polished magnesium uni-body design offers an iconic look and feel that pushes the envelope with an edge just 0.5 inches thin. This Series 9 laptop also includes a brilliant 13.3-inch SuperBright Plus display with HD+ technology, 128 GB Solid State Drive (SSD), 4 GB of system memory, and up to 9 hours of battery life.
